title: x/mobile: Fixes #___ in mobile repository does not appear on issue tracker
body:
https://github.com/golang/mobile/commit/32030f7750bbbe5161bf3ac1f8d4b19944f2d5d4 fixed https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9229 and included the text "Fixes #9229". It was not automatically linked. Should this work?

Somewhat related: why does golang.org/x/review have its own issue tracker, where mobile and tools share the main issue tracker?
